rows.label: tlk41300072_02_msg0001
rows.name:
The Goddess of the Holy See is dead,
I hear.

rows.label: tlk41300072_02_msg0002
rows.name:
That's what they get for dealing
in Blades and sending them out
to Superbia and Invidia.

rows.label: tlk41300072_02_msg0003
rows.name:
...Sorry, that was disrespectful of me.
Pretend you didn't hear any of that.

rows.label: tlk41300072_02_msg0004
rows.name:
That goddess was the reason we got
all our food rations, after all.
